text: ya'akubaru maranada ancinalliddaga nivu nodiddira? Avaru tam'ma putrarodane ‘‘nanna (maranada) balika nivu yarannu aradhisuviri?’’ Endu kelidaga avaru, (putraru) ‘‘nim'ma odeyanu, nim'ma purvajarada ibrahim, isma'il mattu is'hak‌ra odeyanu agiruva a eka matra aradhyanannu matra aradhisuvevu mattu navu avanige saranagiruvevu’’ endaru
